## SessionDelegate.onInvite() method

Receive re-INVITE request. https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3261\#section-14.2

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```

|  request | <code>IncomingInviteRequest</code> | Incoming INVITE request. |
